growthStories.title: Growth Stories
growthStories.description: Read how other students improved their performance with our platform

stories.name: Alex K.
stories.story: I struggled with math for years until I started using EduTrack. The personalized recommendations helped me identify and fix my weak areas.
stories.subject: Mathematics

stories.name: Maria S.
stories.story: The analytics helped me understand my learning patterns and focus my efforts where they matter most. My grades improved significantly!
stories.subject: Physics

stories.name: Daniel T.
stories.story: I used to hate studying languages, but the interactive lessons made it fun. Now I look forward to my daily practice.
stories.subject: English

stories.name: Sophia L.
stories.story: The progress tracking motivated me to keep improving. I can actually see my knowledge growing week by week.
stories.subject: Chemistry

stories.name: Nathan P.
stories.story: Preparing for university entrance exams was stressful until I found EduTrack. The structured approach made all the difference.
stories.subject: Biology

chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.greeting: Hello! I'm your educational AI assistant. How can I help you today?
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again.
chat.contextInfo: I'm ready to help with questions about mathematics, physics, chemistry, biology, history, literature, and other subjects. How can I assist you today?
examples: Explain the concept of quadratic equations
How do I solve a system of linear equations?
Tell me about the periodic table of elements
How should I structure a literature essay?
